Title: Total Number of Active Users
Description: The number of unique addresses that were active as the initiator of a successful transaction.

Title: Total Number of Transactions
Description: The total number of transactions whether it has been successful or not.

Title: Transactions per Second
Description: The number of transactions per second whether it has been successful or not.

Title: Transaction Success Rate
Description: The success rate of transactions in percent.

Title: Total Number of Blocks
Description: The total number of blocks created.

Title: Total Transaction Fees [USD]
Description: The total amount of fees in U.S. dollars paid to conduct transactions.

Title: Median Fees per Transaction [USD]
Description: The median amount of fees per transaction in U.S. dollars.

Title: Average Fees per Transaction [USD]
Description: The average amount of fees per transaction in U.S. dollars.

Title: Total Gas Used
Description: The total amount of gas used to conduct transactions.

Title: Median Gas Used
Description: The median amount of gas used per transaction.

Title: Average Gas Used
Description: The average amount of gas used per transaction.

Title: Total Number of Token Transfers
Description: The total number of token transfer transactions.

Title: Total Swaps Volume [USD]
Description: The total volume of swaps in U.S. dollars.

Title: Total Swaps Volume [USD]
Description: The total volume of swaps in U.S. dollars on each decentralized exchange.

Title: Total Number of Swaps
Description: The total number of swap transactions.

Title: Total Number of Swaps
Description: The total number of swap transactions on each decentralized exchange.

Title: Total Number of Swappers
Description: The total number of unique addresses conducting swap transactions.

Title: Total Number of Swappers
Description: The total number of unique addresses conducting swap transactions on each decentralized exchange.

Title: Total Sales Volume [USD]
Description: The total volume of NFT sales in U.S. dollars.

Title: Total Sales Volume by Marketplace [USD]
Description: The total volume of NFT sales by each marketplace in U.S. dollars.

Title: Total Number of Sales
Description: The total number of NFT sales.

Title: Total Number of Buyers
Description: The total number of NFT buyers.

Title: Total Number of Traded NFTs
Description: The total number of Traded NFTs.

Title: Total Number of Traded NFT Collections
Description: The total number of Traded NFT Collections.
